reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here in May for 2 nights and couldn't believe how quiet it was. Near the end of our holiday, had done a lot of travelling so decided to spend a lazy day by the pool. We had it to ourselves for almost the whole day; were only joined by one other couple at about 4.00pm!
reviews.title: Lovely Hotel

reviews.text: The hotel was excellent, very large comfortable room overlooking the garden. Staff friendly and helpful. Due to it being so quiet there was a lmited set menu for dinner. You had to order at breakfast if you wanted to eat. We liked the look of it so decided to try it. Excellent, really good and also very good value at 20 euros for 3 courses. House wine also very good.
reviews.title: Excellent!!

reviews.text: The only downside I can think of is that it might be a little noisy in the peak season (assuming they have one!) as it is on the junction of 2 roads which lead to the harbour and beach. Also, if you prefer the beach to a swimming pool it would be quite a walk but no problem with a car.
reviews.title: Absolutely perfect!

reviews.text: Wonderful staff and facilities. This hotel is brand new, cozy and much more. You're going to enjoy a four stars facility and staff together with a family environment. Alberto (the owner), who is fluent in German and English, will illustrate you all the place to visit around and help you with any problems you might have during your traveling. Last but not least, restaurant is simply amazing!!!
reviews.title: Charming

reviews.text: Great hotel with good facilities...comfortable beds, large rooms, good pool, good breakfast though would be nice to have fresh juice...also haa a sauna and jacuzzi and free wifi...above all good service and made to feel at home! Cannot recommend enough.
reviews.title: Great Hotel ****
